trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Westland
There was one other sighting in Westland on or around December 14th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching meteorites around midnight for 30 mins. or so and seen 3 dull lights that glimmered in a triangular shape. The lights looked to be behind some sort of force shield. I watched this U.F.O like object travel for several miles. This sighting was strange to me because this happened in the only clear opening in the sky . I seen several meteorites that night in sky that night . This night took place on the peak of a meteor shower on or around the date I had given .
Summary: I was watching meteorites and seen 3 dull triangular lights that seemed like they were behindd a force shield ...I then wached it go for several miles ..it was very clear outside
